functions.name: getCurrentInvitation
functions.description: Finds the Exchange Item ID of the currently viewed message (not the ID of the event in the message)

functions.name: notifyFolderResync
functions.description: Notifies the back end to resynchronise a calendar

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key for the JsAccount server.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of folder, either Calendar or Tasks.

functions.name: registerCalendar
functions.description: Notifies the back end that a calendar is available

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key for the JsAccount server.

events.name: dispatcher
events.description: The master dispatcher for calendar requests.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key for the incoming server used to store connection properties.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The name of the calendar operation.

extraParameters.name: scheme
extraParameters.description: The scheme used to distinguish account types.
